home.title: Home | Pornchai's Portfolio
home.subTitle: Front-end Developer
home.introText:
Graduated from EFREI Paris, I am currently looking for a front-end developer position in Grenoble. Passionate about the web universe since I was 15, I design fluid and aesthetic interfaces that optimize user experience.

Career & Skills
During my training at EFREI Paris, I developed strong autonomy and rapid adaptability. This school encourages us to be self-taught from the first year, reinforcing my already existing passion for continuous learning.

My expertise was built through various client missions:
• Creation of showcase websites for catering
• Development of iOS and Android mobile applications
• Design and management of databases with advanced search systems
• And many other custom projects

Professional Approach
I fully invest in each project with a structured approach:
• In-depth exchange to understand needs
• Precise definition of issues
• Development with regular follow-up
• Professional delivery and installation

By nature calm and collaborative, I easily adapt to new technologies and methodologies to effectively meet technical challenges.

Professional Objective
My ambition is to bring quality code and creative solutions to ambitious projects. If you are looking for a motivated profile to join your team, I would be delighted to discuss your needs and my potential contribution.

Do not hesitate to contact me for any additional information.
